data.Sentence_cn: 课文38  水和旅行者
data.Sentence: --- Lesson 38 Water and the traveller

data.Sentence_cn: 这篇文章说了什么？
data.Sentence: What does this text describe?

data.Sentence_cn: 水源的污染通常是由于接近水源的地方卫条件太差而造成的：
data.Sentence: Contamination of water supplies is usually due to poor sanitation close to water sources,

data.Sentence_cn: 污水排入水源，污水渗入给水系统或工农业污水造成污染。
data.Sentence: sewage disposal into the sources themselves, leakage of sewage into distribution systems or contamination with industrial or farm waste.

data.Sentence_cn: 即使管道供水系统在水源处安全的，等水到达龙头时就不一定总是安全的了。
data.Sentence: Even if a piped water supply is safe at its source, it is not always safe by the time it reaches the tap.

data.Sentence_cn: 断断续续的水管应该被视为是非常可疑的。
data.Sentence: Intermittent tap-water supplies should be regarded as particularly suspect.

data.Sentence_cn: 短途旅行到水质不保险的地区时，
data.Sentence: Travellers on short trips to areas with water supplies of uncertain quality

data.Sentence_cn: 应避免饮用水龙头的水或未经处理任何其他来源的水。
data.Sentence: should avoid drinking tap-water, or untreated water from any other source.

data.Sentence_cn: 最好仅饮用开水，名牌瓶装或罐装水 -- 装瓶厂通常遵循国际水处理的标准。
data.Sentence: It is best to keep to hot drinks, bottled or canned drinks of well-known brand names-international standard of water treatment are usually followed at bottling plants.

data.Sentence_cn: 碳酸饮料是酸性的，就更安全一些。
data.Sentence: Carbonated drinks are acidic, and slightly safer.

data.Sentence_cn: 确保瓶子是当你面开启的，瓶口清洁干燥。
data.Sentence: Make sure that all bottles are opened in your presence, and that their rims are clean and dry.

data.Sentence_cn: 烧开一直是水处理的一种好办法。
data.Sentence: Boiling is always a good way of treating water.

data.Sentence_cn: 有的酒店根据要求可提供开水，这些开水可用于饮用和刷牙。
data.Sentence: Some hotels supply boiled water on request and this can be used for drinking, or for brushing teeth.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果有相配的电压，可以煮少量水的便携式热水装置是有用的。
data.Sentence: Portable boiling elements that can boil small quantities of water are useful when the right voltage of electricity is available.

data.Sentence_cn: 应谢绝任何不明来源的冷饮。
data.Sentence: Refuse politely any cold drink from an unknown source.

data.Sentence_cn: 冰块只有当制造冰块的水安全时才是保险的，
data.Sentence: Ice is only as safe as the water from which it is made,

data.Sentence_cn: 只有知道冰块安全时才能加入饮料。
data.Sentence: and should not be put in drinks unless it is known to be safe.

data.Sentence_cn: 可以把饮料置于冰块之上来冷却，而不是把冰块加进饮料之中。
data.Sentence: Drinks can be cooled by placing them on ice rather than adding ice to them.

data.Sentence_cn: 酒精可能是医学上的消毒剂，但决不可用来消毒饮用水。
data.Sentence: Alcohol may be a medical disinfectant, but should not be relied upon to sterilize water.

data.Sentence_cn: 乙醇的浓度为50%至70%时比较有效，
data.Sentence: Ethanol is more effective at a concentration of 50-70 percent;

data.Sentence_cn: 浓度低于20%时，杀菌能力基本上就不存在了。
data.Sentence: below 20 per cent, its bactericidal action is negligible.

data.Sentence_cn: 强度标为95的酒中含有47%的酒精。
data.Sentence: Spirits labelled 95 proof contain only about 47 per cent alcohol.

data.Sentence_cn: 要提防甲基化酒精，
data.Sentence: Beware of methylated alcohol,

data.Sentence_cn: 那是剧毒的，永远不能掺入饮用水。
data.Sentence: which is very poisonous and should never be added to drinking water.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果没有其他安全的饮用水，
data.Sentence: If no other safe water supply can be obtained,

data.Sentence_cn: 水管中流出的烫手的水可以留下来冷却。这种水一般是安全的。
data.Sentence: tap water that is too hot to touch can be left to cool and is generally safe to drink.

data.Sentence_cn: 那些计划去偏远地区旅行、或在没有现成饮用水的国家居住的人，
data.Sentence: Those planning a trip to remote areas, or intending to live in countries where drinking water is not readily available,

data.Sentence_cn: 应该知道如何使水适于饮用的各种办法。
data.Sentence: should know about the various possible methods for making water safe.
